actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-695.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of May 17, 1954, relating to the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial, to authorize increased funding for the East Saint Louis portion of the Memorial, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates the East Saint Louis extension of the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial. Repeals provisions requiring the Secretary of the Interior to approve the plan for the extension. Authorizes increased funding for the extension.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of May 17, 1954, relating to the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial, to authorize increased funding for the East Saint Louis portion of the Memorial, and for other purposes.
